title: G.I. Zombie: A Star-Spangled War Story
description: Meet the soldier they call G.I. Zombie! In these stories from issues #1-8 and FUTURES END #1, an undercover operation exposes a terrorist plot â€“ and the only thing in its way is a zombie with an AK-47! Plus, the only man who can negotiate with terrorists is already dead!
author: Jimmy Palmiotti
